metadata.name: Over The Dunes
metadata.description:
This is a world just over the dunes. Be observant in this world, there is beauty everywhere. 

I have paired this piece with custom analogue sound design to really accentuate the dimensional characteristics of this other world. I feel that this type of work is only truly 3D when there is sound added

The full length of this loop is 2 minutes. The sound design is full of life and forever changing. 

Allow yourself to become lost within this piece.

(Upon your purchase, I will provide you with the full length 4K loop)
